about_the_game:
Bullet Soul Original Soundtrack for STEAM
This DLC delivers not only the in-game tunes from the main game, but also all the music included in the original Xbox 360 DLC as an added bonus!
Composers Kenji Ito and Kohta Takahashi , join forces as RESONATOR with back up from Noriyuki Kamikura.

* Both MP3 and FLAC will be downloaded into your local BULLET SOUL Steam folder.

Track listing:

01: MAIN MENU
02: SELECT
03: STAGE 1
04: BOSS
05: STAGE 2
06: STAGE 3
07: STAGE 4
08: STAGE 5
09: FINAL BOSS
10: TRUE BOSS
11: ESCAPE
12: NAME
13: GAME OVER
14: UNUSED BGM
15: CARAVAN A
16: CARAVAN B
17: CARAVAN TIMEUP
